ingredients.item: 400g can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in boiling water for 11-13 minutes until tender. Drain and return to the pan.

Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan, and fry the chicken and chorizo for 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes, beans and peas, and cook for a further 2-3 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat. Season.
Toss the chicken mix into the pasta. Sprinkle with parsley.
